name: User Story
about: Template to create a new user story with acceptance criteria

## Title / User Story
As a [role/type of user], I want to [action to perform] so that [expected result/value].

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Criterion 1...
- [ ] Criterion 2...

## Implementation Details
*Add technical notes, dependencies, or architectural considerations here.*

## Testing Notes
*Describe the steps or scenarios to validate that this story is complete and functional.*
